issue.title: [CF 1425] Requesting snapshot option
issue.body:
Hi first,

 

I would like to request a snapshopt option in TMW for the tracking of the dot strenght. Why am i requesting this. I am playing a feral druid atm and I have to watch my bleedings in dependency to my buffs.  For this i created multiple icons to track my dots and when i have to renew them. The problem is about the extent of my tracking method. In case to make this work I have to calculate the dmg of my dot in google spreadsheets  transferring it in my tmw icon. I have to do this for my 2-3 dots with every opportunity possible. This means i have to do this in combination if I am in vanish or berserker is up or whatever buff from my talents is up that can snapshot my dots.This leads to 16 icons where in every icon i have to set my calculation from the spreadsheet manually (and this is without the 52 talent from the weapon,which means i have to double the bars, one with and one without the agility buff). I need to recalculate it for every new item that i get and repeat this step. Another problem about this is that i am bound to use trinkets and enchantments that dont give me any procs that can snapshot my dots.

Is there a way to make a snapshot option happen or at least to improve my method?

 

Best regards
